post:
AlphaVPS is a newly found company, based in Bulgaria under the name DA International Group Ltd. . Our main purpose is to offer reliable, stable and efficient solutions, which are reasonably priced. We specialize in managed and unmanaged hosting solutions, including, but not limited to: Managed/Unmanaged VPS, shared and reseller hosting. Our hardware is located in Telepoint DC in Sofia, Bulgaria. We utilize only server-grade hardware, top bandwidth providers as well as top-grade DataCenter, allowing us to offer a great uptime guarantee and a SLA. All our nodes are continuously monitored for abuse by our staff and by multiple inhouse monitoring solutions, keeping the performace as good as possible and the abuse next to zero.​
 

30% of reccuring discount for all VPSBoard members with the coupon: VPSB

 

Our unamanged plans are as follow:

  • 1gbps Port
  • Linux OS
ORDER NOW

Additional IPs cost 2 euros per month. Additional Disk Space, CPU cores and RAM can also be purchased on great pricing. Just open a ticket, requesting a quote and I'm sure we'll get you upgraded in no time.

 

We offer a large variety of managed VPS as well, which include cPanel license: http://alphavps.bg/managed.html

 

All of the VMs, currently offered by AlphaVPS are based on OpenVZ virt and come with SolusVM panel and automatic rDNS. TUN/TAP/PPP can also be enabled from our SolusVM panel.
